metadata.name: Mari's Summer Holiday
metadata.description:
「マリの夏休み」

-A Story of Blinking Girls #001 "Marigold"-


During her summer holiday, Mari often goes to visit her grandma's house in Saitama prefecture, Japan. She loves walking in the marigold field by the sea, feeling the warm breeze on her skin.


Pixel Animation: "Mari's Summer Holiday" By TAKE
Song: "Natsuka ~Summer Wind~" By JJ.SPP
